permissions: User must be authorized for the related commitment via CommitmentPolicy (admin or membership as the commitment buyer/seller organization: customer manager, broker member, or trucker manager).
validation_notes: Status filter accepts only enqueued or processed. created-at-min/max and updated-at-min/max must be valid date-time values (ISO 8601) and may not be empty when provided.

flags.name: --status
flags.description: Filter by status (enqueued, processed). Example: --status enqueued.

flags.name: --created-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time; filter cannot be empty.

flags.name: --created-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time; filter cannot be empty.

flags.name: --updated-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time; filter cannot be empty.

flags.name: --updated-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time; filter cannot be empty.
